OFFICIAL RECORD 
UNCLASSIFIED 
FEDERAL BUREAU OF INVESTIGATION 
Intake 
Date: 38/04/2020 
Case ID #: 50D-NY-3027571 (U) EPSTEIN, JEFFREY; CHILD SEX 
TRAFFICKING 
Drafted By: 
Date/Time Received: 08/03/2020 12:28 PM EDT 
Details: 
On 08/03/2020, at 12:28 p.m. Eastern Time, an anonymous tipster 
(Anonymous), IP address , resolving from Finland, submitted 
an online tip to the FBI National Threat Operations Center (NTOC) via 
tips.fbi.gov to report information regarding human trafficking by Jeffery 
Epstein. 
Anonymous provided the following information: 
Date Submitted: 08/03/2020 12:28:06 PM ET 
Transaction Number: 39C2A108-5E11-46DF-A431-D7A85D311629 
Threat To Life: False 
Submitted Text: 
Pedophilia organized by JE for Prince Andrew. For evidence: look for keys 
stored in the drawing room. There are tapes in a secret compartment of a 
drawer next to a Michelangelo picture of a flower vase at his house in 
the Bahamas. Look also for other things in the kitchen. There is also 
another studio apartment in the Bahamas and in Ipanema, Brazil, and 
Florianopolis, Brazil. 
Violation: Public Corruption, White Collar Crime, Civil Rights 
Violation Questions 
What was the exact crime that occurred?: Jeffrey Epstein and Prince 
Andrew of the UK 
UNCLASSIFIED 
EFTA00020470

UNCLASSIFIED 
Re: 50D-NY-3027571, 08/04/2020 
Does this information involve a government official? If so, what is their 
name and 
position/title?: No 
Do you have any evidence to support your claim or know of any witnesses 
to the crime(s)?: Yes 
Did you suffer any personal losses (financially or physically) due to the 
crime?: 
No 
How long has 
this activity been going on?: 15 years
